title: Bug 7752 - Exporting multiple files with the same name in different directories to a zip file fails
description: Steps to reproduce: 1. In the 'Export' dialog window, select both projects created earlier. 2. Give the zip file a name (such as 'test.zip'). 3. Begin the export to zip file.
OB: When exporting multiple files with the same name but located in different directories to a zip file, an error message box pops up. The error message indicates that there are problems with the file of the same name in project2.
EB: The zip file should be able to store files with the same name under different directories without encountering any problems.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create two projects with the same file name in different directories. 2. Use the 'Export' dialog window to select both projects and specify a zip file name. 3. Initiate the export process.
